title: Ancelotti hopeful Madrid star Vinicius will avoid suspension
description: Real Madrid are hopeful Vinicius Junior will avoid a suspension after being sent off in their 2-1 comeback win over Valencia, head coach Carlo Ancelotti said on Sunday. At a pre-match press conference, Ancelotti confirmed Vinicius is travelling to Cartagena for Monday’s Copa del Rey match against fourth-tier Deportiva Minera. The Brazilian winger was sent […] The post Ancelotti hopeful Madrid star Vinicius will avoid suspension appeared first on Soccer News.

title: McKenna frustrated as Ipswich pay the penalty at Craven Cottage
description: Kieran McKenna was frustrated to see yet another lead slip through Ipswich Town’s fingers as they conceded two penalties in Sunday’s 2-2 draw with Fulham. Having beaten Chelsea last time out, Ipswich were on course to record back-to-back wins for the first time this season as they entered second-half stoppage time 2-1 up.
